page.title: 05BRISTOL HORFIELD COMMON
page.content: The thing I like best about Horfield Common is that it is a very good hiding place,if you have done something wrong and you are being followed. You can hide under the roundabout or in the loo in the Tennis Courts (which you are not meant to do).The back lanes are the best places to hide,but they are not really a part of Horfield Common.The Horse Chestnut Trees are good hiding places if you have got the time to get up there.The ditches at the edges also make good hiding places if there is no water in the bottom!
